titles.title: Recognizing the 50th anniversary of the National Association of Chemical Distributors.
Recognizing the 50th anniversary of the National Association of Chemical Distributors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Climate Change.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the National Association of Chemical Distributors on its 50th anniversary and commends the association for its commitment to economic growth, education, safety, and ensuring the safety of chemical handling and distribution.
